商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
留言內容: this shirt was rough, itchy, and baggy on the sides by the rib cage (above the waist), so it looked very unflattering. and i couldn’t size down because it fit properly everywhere else. the elastic in the sleeves were too tight as well

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 2 個綠色灰色尺寸: Small
留言內容: This top is great for business casual or office attire. It’s comfortable and the sleeves and texture dress it up. I actually like it a lot more than I expected. I haven’t washed it yet, so I’m not sure how the texture (crinkly) will hold up to washing. I also like the colors and pattern of the shirt. It’s fun and floral without being too much. The only real negative of the shirt is the elastic on the arms is exposed and not covered with shirt material. (I included a picture). It makes it seem a little cheaper quality and it can be uncomfortable around the arms. I’d steer clear if you I’ve larger biceps, because that may be kind of uncomfortable. It doesn’t irritate me too much and does a decent job of keeping the sleeves where they should be. Also, the shirt is pretty long and good for tucking into a skirt or slacks. It’s not short or cropped at all, if you’re looking for that.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 4 粉紅色尺寸: Small
留言內容: The shirt is full of florals and I'm not complaining.. I LOVE floral. They just look so bright and pretty. The shirt is such a good fabric that it has a nice touch to the skin and is not the least bit right. Fits perfectly right and the colors are PERFECT for spring.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
留言內容: Looking at the photos of the different colors available in this top, I had a very difficult time choosing which to order. Finally choosing, I couldn’t wait to get my order and I was excited opening the package and seeing the bright colors and pattern. The cut and style of the blouse is indeed feminine and cheerful and instantly put a smile on my face. However, when I lifted the top up, I was surprised at how heavy it was…actually thought I must be holding two shirts and not just one. Unfortunately, The weight of this gorgeous flouncy shirt is pretty hefty. Keep in mind, I’m not talking about pounds here, I’m just saying it surely doesn’t feel like a summer shirt. Looking back at the photos, I’d expect this to be a light airy and breezy top, but I’d say it’s the complete opposite. Now don’t get me wrong, It’s still a beautiful blouse and I will easily wear it numerous times. It will just not get worn on the hot days.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 4 粉紅色尺寸: Small
留言內容: This fits true to size. It does kind of lay flat against your whole body so it is not a shirt that will show off curves. But it’s a dressier shirt if you want to wear something nicer than a t shirt. The color is also pretty.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 2 個綠色灰色尺寸: Small
留言內容: So the product pictures are accurate but if you do not style this blouse right, it will look like you raided your grandmother's closet.  The print and cut can easily look outdated, but I do believe as you can see in the product photos there is a chance to make it work. The quality of the material is very nice, not thin or see through and the construction and sewing of the top is very weel done. Not at all cheap looking or feeling. Hopefully I can pull this off without aging myself 25+ years!

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 1 個藍色尺寸: Large
留言內容: Pros:  Love the print and color of this blouse.  It is super soft!  I like the length of the sleeves and the elastic is comfortable - not too tight.  Casual enough to wear with jeans or capris or a skirt, but the feel of the fabric is nice enough to be dressed up for dinner on the town or some special activity.Cons:  The shirt is really long.  If you like that - I guess this is not a con for you, but it feels oddly long to me.  I will end up hemming the length closer to the top of my hips, so it can be worn under a sweater or jacket or it will look more modern with a shorter length.Overall, this is a well-made blouse that looks and feels great - just too long.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 3 個橘色尺寸: Medium
留言內容: I got the 3 orange shirt. When I opened it, it was a lot brighter than I initially thought it would be. It looked to be a lot more muted in the picture. I also couldn't see that it had a very "ribbed" look to it. It's a very pretty shirt, just not really what I expected and with it being that bright, it's not really my color.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 1 個粉紅色尺寸: Large
留言內容: I got this shirt for a job interview and it was great! It was very comfortable and fit true to size. The pattern is cute and vibrant as well.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 2 個綠色灰色尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: ...I'd like this a lot. The print is pretty, the fit is accurate, but the fabric has that polyester sheen that makes me less than love it. Not a so shiny that you need sunglasses, but still...that *cheap* poly sheen.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
留言內容: 40+, 5'6 and 145 lbs ordered medium. The fit was loose enough to be comfortable but not enough to be unflattering. The sleeves were my concern as some tend to be too tight but not these, I wasn't bothered by them the first time. The ribbed material was thicker than a t-shirt and the colors and pattern is so pretty.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 1 個粉紅色尺寸: Large
留言內容: The top has a pretty flower print, fits true to size but also oversized, washes well, material is a little heavy and thicker, and it is comfortable.It is flattering when you wear it tucked in or front tuck. You can wear it with shorts, skirt, jeans or pants.This is the perfect top for spring or summer.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 3 個橘色尺寸: Small
留言內容: This top is so pretty. The fabric has a bit of a sheen to it, which you can’t really see in the product images. I think that the sheen elevates the look a bit.I can fluctuate between a size small and a size medium in tops. I went with a small in this one and was happy with the fit.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 2 個橘色尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: Can wear this top either casually with jeans or shorts, or wear it a little more dressy with a skirt.  The fabric is not cotton guaze, as I had assumed by looking at the picture, but instead a combo of polyester and spandex.  Still, it's lightweight and feels comfy.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 2 個綠色灰色尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: First, at $19.99 and 30% off, this top only costs about $14. That is an incredible bargain and I got myself two. I normally wear an XL but ordered a XXL. I go by the bust size and I did not want this top to be clinging to the girls, lol. It made the top just a tad long, but I can easily stitch that up if I want it shorter. With the colors, it makes styling a breeze. This can be worn casually or even to church. I like the keyhole opening in the back but did not unbutton this to pull over my head. The sleeves almost reach my elbows, hiding these gross old lady arms, lol. The elastic in the arms is not too tight and everything is sewn nicely. The hem of the top is a double seam that is very neat. This top looks like it was purchased in a high-end store! I don't give a lot of fives anymore, but the price and the quality of this top are unbelievably good. If I bought two, it is definitely five star quality goods.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 1 個藍色尺寸: Medium
留言內容: I’m obsessed with this shirt! The fit is nice and loose and the puff sleeves are SO good! The elastic stays put and creates such a beautiful puff. I’ve received so many compliments on this too and for the price it’s incredible! Washes like a dream and requires no pressing. Just put in and go! Super flattering with white jeans. Ordering more of these!

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 1 個粉紅色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: Pretty vibrant colors, fits great!! I’ve had lots of compliments on it everytime I’ve worn it!!

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 3 個橘色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: The quality is quite nice on this top, with a floral design set on a ribbed shirt. It is stretchy, but doesn’t stay stretched out. I love the sleeves! Some people may find them too poofy, but I have a strong preference for feminine designs and patterns. I would say it fits true to form. It washes well and doesn’t need ironing. There is one small caveat:  this shirt is double lined, which is great for not showing your bra, but it is very warm and doesn’t breathe much! I live in the south and would be very uncomfortable in this shirt in July. But during spring, it feels great!

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 1 個粉紅色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: Very pretty spring blouse. It’s well-made, comfortable and lightweight. The back has a pretty pearl button. Looks great with jeans and a skirt, so there’s many styling options.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 1 個粉紅色尺寸: XX-Large
留言內容: I love this easy to care for little shirt. The pink floral print is just adorable, and the fabric lays softly and is not stiff anywhere so this sleeves drapes nicely on the arms.  Very cute!

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
留言內容: This top completely exceeded my expectations. I knew it was not cotton and when it arrived I even thought “oh no, maybe this won’t be good”. The fabric isn’t chiffon feeling like some photos suggest. It’s a synthetic fabric with permanent ribs or “pleats” in it and it has a slight sheen to it. Despite not loving the synthetic fabric, it is a DREAM on! The sleeves are not baggy like on the models - they actually stay up and are quite puffy and perky. I am a 4/6 and ordered the medium and I like the loose fit but I could have sized down.  The elastic isn’t too tight on my arms. The neckline is flattering and it hangs great and is easy to tuck into pants. I’m already back to order more colors because I love how easy it is to throw on with a pair of jeans!

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 2 個綠色灰色尺寸: Medium
留言內容: This blouse is so beautiful. I love the femine touch of the puffed sleeves. Very comfortable. It can be worn with blue jeans or a skirt. It is very versital. I highly recommend!

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 1 個藍色尺寸: Small
留言內容: I liked this top better in the product image. It looks much bluer there. The top is ok, but it's a very loose baggy kind of style, it's not a tailored fit in the right areas, so it hangs loosely where I want it to show curves, and clings to fat where I don't want it to, if I try to pull in the loose hanging areas.The blue flowers are less vibrant in real life, so it doesn't look as blue as it does in the picture. The top is ok for hanging around the house in, but I don't plan on wearing it out much.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
留言內容: A polished blouse with flutter sleeves and a graceful self tie neck bow. This is crafted to be lightweight and it has a hint of stretch for a flexible fit. The fabric feels smooth and comfortable to wear. It has a put-together yet relaxed look...that can be dressed up, or down with your favorite pair of jeans.

商品名稱: Zeagoo 女款 襯衫 洋裝 休閒 春季 花卉 印花 圓領 罩衫泡泡短袖 襯衫
SKU: 顏色: 3 黃色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: True to size! Cute spring top!
